name: Delay Redirect
author: Vasilis Triantafyllou

sections.description:
This little plugin helps you to redirect any page or post on a specific amount of time.

It is simple to use via the post or page editor.

Arbitrary section 1

Thanks for using!
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to post or page editor & enter your url and the amount of time in seconds!
  4. Update & test!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  4. Update & test!
